features: Construction: Breathable shell with minimal lines. Innovative box wall interior with internal waist adjustment to optimize compact heat distribution
Zipper: YKK two-way zipper, protected by a windproof flap with hidden snaps
Hood: Fixed with internal headband adjustment
Cuffs: Storm cuffs insulated for a secure and comfortable fit
Pockets: Two minimal hand pockets, lined in microthermal polyester. Inside pocket with zipper closure for easy access and the safe storage of essential items
Signature Quartz Co. patch: White Alcantara Suede
